p: The kinetic mechanisms of active compounds 1 and 2 towards α-glucosidase were determined by the graphical views of Dixon and Lineweaver- Burk plots [ 30]. The concentration ranges for the substrates were 0.8-5.0 mM. The concentration of the enzyme was kept constant at 1.3 U/mL. Lineweaver-Burk plots were established to evaluate the type of inhibition. Dixon plots were used to calculate inhibitory constant ( K i) values of the tested compounds. Each kinetic analysis was implemented in triplicate from which mean K i values.
